---
Help: Radera en hållbar utvecklingspost
---
!contents -R2 -g -p -f -h
!1 Testar radera en hållbar utvecklingspost
Det ska gå att radera en hållbar utvecklingspost via REST API:et.

!***> Skapa en ny hållbar utvecklingspost

Först skapar vi en hållbar utvecklingspost, för att sedan kunna radera den

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | json | testCreateRecordCreatedType? | getStatusType? | getCreatedId? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | {"children":[{"children":[{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"system"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"diva"}],"name":"dataDivider"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"validationType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"sustainableDevelopment"}],"name":"validationType"}],"name":"recordInfo"},{"children":[{"name":"sustainableDevelopmentName","value":"Fitnesse sustainalbeDevelopment to be deleted"},{"name":"language","value":"sv"}],"name":"name"},{"children":[{"name":"sustainableDevelopmentName","value":"Fitnesse sustainalbeDevelopment to be deleted (eng)"},{"name":"language","value":"en"}],"name":"alternativeName"},{"name":"domain","value":"du"}],"name":"sustainableDevelopment"} | sustainableDevelopment | CREATED | $createdId= |

*!
!***> Läs den nyskapade hållbar utvecklingsposten i Json

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | $createdId | =~/"value":"Fitnesse sustainalbeDevelopment to be deleted"/ | OK |

*!
!***> Lista hållbar utveckling

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | testReadRecordList? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | | OK |

*!
!***> Radera den nyskapade hållbar utvecklingsposten

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testDeleteRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | $createdId | | OK |

*!
!***> Försök läsa den raderade hållbar utvecklingsposten

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | $createdId | | NOT_FOUND |

*!
!***> Lista hållbar utveckling - hållbar utvecklingsposter med status DELETED exkluderas

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | testReadRecordList? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | sustainableDevelopment | | OK |

*!
